entry.title: New Reports of War Crimes in Ukraine Emerge as Russians Retreat
entry.content: More than 100 civilians have been buried in mass graves by local authorities in Bucha since Russian troops withdrew from the Kyiv-area suburb last week.

entry.title: Cancún's Tourist Idyll Is Shattered by Drug Violence and Homicides
entry.content: Mexico’s Riviera Maya area has seen an alarming rise in killings. The violence in the country’s top tourism spot is being fueled by demand for narcotics by the tourists themselves.
